dublinCore.dc:title: 105 S790 IS: To redesignate the National Historic Trails Interpretive Center in Casper, Wyoming, as the “Barbara L. Cubin National Historic Trails Interpretive Center”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Ms. Lummis (for herself and Mr. Barrasso) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

form.official-title: To redesignate the National Historic Trails Interpretive Center in Casper, Wyoming, as the Barbara L. Cubin National Historic Trails Interpretive Center.

section.header: Designation of Barbara L. Cubin National Historic Trails Interpretive Center

subsection.text: The National Historic Trails Interpretive Center established under section 2(a) of Public Law 105–290 (112 Stat. 2783) in Casper, Wyoming, shall be known and designated as the Barbara L. Cubin National Historic Trails Interpretive Center.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the National Historic Trails Interpretive Center referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Barbara L. Cubin National Historic Trails Interpretive Center.

Section 2(a) of Public Law 105–290 (112 Stat. 2783) is amended, in the second sentence, by striking the National Historic Trails Interpretive Center and inserting the Barbara L. Cubin National Historic Trails Interpretive Center.
